TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含用于跟踪和管理相关控件组的 控件的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是控件的只读集合，通常由 和 控件用于管理 控件集。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by and controls to manage sets of controls. 控件使用 对象来保存 页面上所有控件的列表，而控件则 使用 对象跟踪 它所包含的控件。A control uses a object to keep a list of all the controls on a page, whereas a control uses a object to track the controls that it contains. > [!NOTE] > 集合同时包含 控件和其他服务器控件 (例如用户控件、自定义控件和 ASP.NET 控件) ，这些控件位于区域中 并用作 Web 部件应用程序的一部分。The collection contains both controls and other server controls (such as user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls) that are placed in zones and used as part of Web Parts applications. 例如，如果您在 某个页面中有一个区域，并且在该区域内声明一个自定义 控件和 ASP.NET 控件，则这两个控件都将位于该 属性引用的集合中 。So, for example, if you have a zone in a page, and within it you declare a custom control and the ASP.NET control, both controls will be in the collection referenced by the property. 对象存在，以便 Web 部件控件集可以使用强类型集合。The object exists so that the Web Parts control set can work with strongly typed collections. 同样，如果要对一组控件执行批量操作 ，则可以使用属性获取对对象的引用 。Similarly, if you want to perform mass operations on a set of controls, you can get a reference to a object using the property. 例如，你可能想要循环遍历 页面上的所有控件，并以某种方式更改它们的外观。For example, you might want to loop through all the controls on a page and change their appearance in some way. 即使 对象是只读的，你也可以对集合中引用的基础控件的属性进行编程更改。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Web 部件页上使用对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the object on a Web Parts page. 此示例包含三个部分：This example has three parts: - 分部类中页的代码。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含控件的网页。The Web page that contains the controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。A description of how the example works in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分包含分部类中页的代码。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 请注意， `Button1_Click` 方法会创建一个 对象，该对象包含 属性中引用的所有控件 ，其中包括 页面上的所有控件。Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a object that consists of all the controls referenced in the property, which includes all the controls on the page. 方法循环访问所有控件，并切换每个控件的 属性，以确定控件是正常还是最小化。The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 此代码示例的第二部分是包含控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 请注意，在中声明的控件 `WebPartZone1` 是标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，但由于它们 在运行时被包装为控件，并且 该类继承自 类，因此控件将 在运行时自动被视为控件，因此包含在对象中 。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls are automatically treated as controls at run time and therefore are included in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面并单击 " **切换 ChromeState** " 按钮后，分部类中的代码将循环遍历该 对象，并以其他方式最小化控件或将其返回到正常。After you load the page in a browser and click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, the code in the partial class loops through the object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal. 或者，如果反复单击 " **切换 BulletedList1 标题** " 按钮，最上面控件的标题将更改为替换值。Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化 类的空的新实例。

span.span: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化类的空实例 。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 对象本身是只读的，没有方法可向其中添加单个 控件; 因此，你几乎不需要使用此构造函数。The object itself is read-only and has no method to add individual controls to it; therefore, you will have little occasion to use this constructor.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 通过传入 控件的 集合来初始化 对象的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a object by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数 通过传入控件的集合来初始化类的实例 。The constructor initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of controls. 尽管 对象是只读的，并且没有用于向其中添加单个控件的方法，但您可以创建自己 的控件集合，并将其传递给 构造函数。Although a object is read-only and there is no method for adding individual controls to it, you can create your own collection of controls, and pass that to the constructor. 这使你可以创建自定义集合并对其执行批量操作。This enables you to create custom collections and perform bulk operations on them. 你还可以访问集合中的基础控件，并以编程方式更改它们的属性值。You can also access the underlying controls in the collection and change their property values programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在 Web 部件页上使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor on a Web Parts page. 此示例包含三个部分：This example has three parts: - 分部类中页的代码。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含控件的网页。The Web page that contains the controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。A description of how the example works in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分包含分部类中页的代码。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 请注意， `Button1_Click` 方法会创建一个 对象，该对象包含 属性中引用的所有控件 ，其中包括 页面上的所有控件。Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a object that consists of all the controls referenced in the property, which includes all the controls on the page. 方法循环访问所有控件，并切换每个控件的 属性，以确定控件是正常还是最小化。The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 此代码示例的第二部分是包含控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 请注意，在中声明的控件 `WebPartZone1` 是标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，但由于它们 在运行时被包装为控件，并且 该类继承自 类，因此控件将 在运行时自动被视为控件，因此包含在对象中 。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls are automatically treated as controls at run time and therefore are included in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，单击 " **切换 ChromeState** " 按钮，然后可以看到分部类中的代码循环遍历该 对象，并以其他方式最小化控件或将其返回到正常。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, and notice that the code in the partial class loops through the object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal. 或者，如果反复单击 " **切换 BulletedList1 标题** " 按钮，最上面控件的标题将更改为替换值。Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.

Public Function Contains (value As WebPart) As Boolean

param.name: value
param.span: 要对其进行检查以确定是否位于集合中的 。

span.span: A that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示集合中是否存在特定控件。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示集合中是否存在特定控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，可以检查特定 对象并确定该对象是否为对象的一部分 。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is part of a object.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As WebPart(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 对象的数组，用于包含复制的集合。

span.span: An array of objects to contain the copied collection.

param.name: index
param.span: 在数组中放置集合内容的起始点。

span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 将集合复制到 对象的数组。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您想要组合可包含对象中的控件的自定义数组 、这些控件的子集或这些控件的超集时，方法非常有用。The method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart value) cil managed
Public Function IndexOf (value As WebPart) As Integer

span.span: A that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回集合中特定成员的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

returns.span: 一个整数，指示集合中特定对象的位置。

span.span: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Web 部件页面上有多个控件，并且需要知道一个控件相对于其他控件的序号位置，则此方法很有用。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one control relative to the others.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 根据位置或唯一标识符返回集合中的特定成员。

span.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As WebPart

param.name: index
param.span: 集合中特定的 控件的索引。

span.span: The index of a particular control in a collection.

summary.span: 基于集合中的位置返回集合的成员。

span.span: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.

value.span: 位于集合中指定索引处的 。

span.span: A at the specified index in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用索引 器可以 按索引访问对象中的基础控件 ，并可以更改其属性值或调用方法。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by index, and change their property values or call methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Web 部件页上使用索引器。The following code example demonstrates the use of the indexer on a Web Parts page. 此示例包含三个部分：This example has three parts: - 分部类中页的代码。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含控件的网页。The Web page that contains the controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。A description of how the example works in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分包含分部类中页的代码。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 请注意， `Button2_Click` 方法会创建一个空 的对象，然后将其分配给该 属性中的控件 `WebPartZone1.WebParts` 。Note that the `Button2_Click` method creates an empty object, then assigns to it the controls from the `WebPartZone1.WebParts` property. 方法使用其索引访问集合中的第一个控件，并切换其 属性值。The method accesses the first control in the collection by using its index, and toggles its property value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 此代码示例的第二部分是包含控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 请注意，在中声明的控件 `WebPartZone1` 是标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，但由于它们 在运行时被包装为控件，并且 该类继承自 类，因此在运行时可以将控件视为 控件，并使其成为 对象的一部分。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls can be treated as controls at run time and made part of a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，单击 " **切换 BulletedList1 标题** " 按钮，可以看到代码在两个可用标题选项之间切换控件的标题。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, and notice that the code toggles the title of the control between the two available title choices.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(id As String) As WebPart

param.name: id
param.span: 集合中特定 控件的唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifier for a particular control in a collection.

summary.span: 基于唯一字符串标识符返回集合的成员。

span.span: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.

value.span: 集合中 ID 等于 的值的第一个 。

span.span: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用索引器，可以 根据唯一标识符访问对象中的控件。The indexer enables you to access a control in a object according to a unique identifier. > [!NOTE] > Web 部件控件集对此属性执行不区分大小写的匹配，因此区分大小写不是唯一值的一部分 `id` 。The Web Parts control set performs case-insensitive matching on this property, so case sensitivity is not part of a unique `id` value. 在某些特殊情况下，属性还能用于标识对象的成员。The property also works to identify members of a object in some specialized cases. 对于 控件，索引器可以与控件所包装的基础子控件的标识符相匹配 。In the case of controls, the indexer is able to match the identifier for the underlying child control wrapped by the control. 对于 控件，索引器会根据参数的不区分大小写的比较 `id` 和 或属性值来匹配控件的标识符 。In the case of controls, the indexer matches the identifier for the control based on a case-insensitive comparison of the `id` parameter and either the or property values.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
